identity.name: E1 - The Future Terminal
identity.core_philosophy: Data is beautiful. The interface should feel like a specialized tool for an elite trader, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Metric values

body.usage: Navigation, Table data, Labels, Form inputs

rules: Use JetBrains Mono for ALL numbers and financial data to ensure tabular alignment.
Headings must be uppercase with 'tracking-tight' if larger than 24px.
Labels (tiny text) must be uppercase with 'tracking-widest'.

Card.style: Flat background (#0A0A0A), 1px border (#262626), No shadow. Sharp edges (rounded-sm).

Input.style: bg-[#0F0F0F] border-border/50 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm font-mono

Badge.style: rounded-full px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono font-medium border border-transparent

textures.name: Cyber Grid Background
textures.usage: Use as a subtle overlay on the main dashboard background with opacity-10 and blend-mode-overlay.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use 'spotlight' gradients (radial) to highlight active areas.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with stroke-width={1.5}. For crypto icons, use the URLs provided.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run `yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge recharts`.
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Manrope' in `index.css` from Google Fonts.
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and fonts defined above. Set `fontFamily` defaults.
4. LAYOUT: Create a sidebar layout (fixed left nav, scrollable main content). The sidebar should be minimal (icons only on mobile, expanded on desktop).
5. CHARTS: Use `recharts`. Style the lines with `strokeWidth={2}` and `dot={false}`. Use gradients for the `AreaChart` fill.
6. ARBITRAGE CARD: This is the 'Hero' of the dashboard. Give it a special 'glow' border or a distinct background color (e.g., bg-primary/5) to make it pop.
7. ERROR STATES: Since this is a trading bot, error messages (API failure, Insufficient funds) must be highly visible (Destructive Toast + Red Border on Form).
8. DO NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid for readability.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
